entry.title: 3-2-1 Fantastic Facial Kit
entry.summary:

Type: Skincare

Description 

This limited edition facial kit by One Love Organics was designed to pamper and relieve stress for the busy beauty. The routine features 3 easy steps, requires only 2 products and gives 1 fantastic result. It is the perfect gift or travel companion. 

The Set includes:

Brand New Day Microderma Scrub + Masque | .4 oz

$35 ($49 Value)

entry.title: Skin Dew Coconut Water Cream (New!)
entry.summary:
Vendor: One Love Organics
Type: Skincare
Price: 58.00

Description 

Skin Dew Coconut Water Cream helps to combat dehydration and promote balanced, moisture-rich, and healthy-looking skin. This powerful, plant-based formula is crafted with: 

  • Over 50% pure, mineral rich Coconut Water to hydrate and nourish.
  • Cupuacu Butter, a polyphenol-rich moisturizer sourced from the Amazon, to help neutralize free radicals that contribute to premature aging.
  • A clinically proven complex of acacia, jojoba and sunflower to form a protective, breathable film to help lock-in hydration and defend skin against environmental aggressors.

It benefits all skin types and is especially good for dull, dehydrated, and combination skin. Intensely moisturizing, yet surprisingly lightweight, this cream absorbs into the skin within a minute or two and layers well with other products.

Our Beauty Notes: ﻿This completely novel product feels incredible on skin creating the lightest application, that isn't necessarily a 'watery-y feeling' (as the coconut water ingredient implies), but rather feels like a thin cream. This penetrates the skin deeply for a lighter coverage of deep hydration and is an ideal everyday moisturizer for skin that may be thirsty, dry, sensitive or aging. 

 

Ingredients 

Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Juice*, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil*, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cetearyl Alcohol, Jojoba Esters, Theobroma Grandiflorum Seed Butter*, Propanediol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Wax, Xylitylglucoside, Cetearyl Glucoside, Citrullus Vulgaris (Watermelon) Seed Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Pulp Extract*, Lactic Acid, Alaria Esculenta Extract, Acacia Decurrens Flower Wax, Tocopherol, Sclerotium Gum, Xylitol, Polyglycerin-3, Glyceryl Undecylenate, Glyceryl Caprylate, Anhydroxylitol May Contain: Maltodextrin

*Ingredients from Organic Farming

entry.title: Squalane Facial Oil
entry.summary:
Vendor: Indie Lee
Type: Skincare
Price: 32.00

Description
Brand Seen In: Cosmopolitan, Vogue, Refinery29, Zoe Report, Today Show, Lucky, Marie Claire, Allure, Style, Glamour, ELLE, Bazaar & More 

"Certified Chic" - Vogue 

"The Most Inspiring Beauty Brand Ever" - Cosmopolitan Magazine 

100% pure, olive-derived squalane oil promotes skin elasticity, diminishes age spots and hyper pigmentation, and boosts cell regeneration and oxygenation. Improves texture and tone. Leaves the complexion feeling soft and nourished - never greasy and non-pore clogging. Ideal for all skin types including dry, sensitive, oily and acne prone. 1 oz. 

Our Beauty Notes: This non-comedogenic (non pore clogging) oil is perfect for all skin types and we appreciate it for its virtually no smell, never-greasy application and it's ability to tackle skin discoloration and dullness. OUR TIP: Start small and work your way up to finding the right amount of drops for your ideal look and feel.  

Indie Lee tugged at our heart strings initially with her story of overcoming a brain tumor to discover the link between conventional beauty and its potential health harm. After learning about her story, she then struck us with a genius product line that conquers disbelieve in clean beauty. Since regaining her health, she has taken the clean beauty world by storm creating the chic, effective and modern (right up our alley!): Indie Lee. 

Ingredients 

100% Squalane Oil (Olive derived).

Use

Apply 2 or 3 drops of oil to freshly cleansed skin, both day and night. Ideal for all skin types: dry, oily, combination, acne prone, and sensitive. For external use only.

entry.title: Squalane Facial Cream

Vendor: Indie Lee
Type: Skincare
Price: 70.00

Description

"Certified Chic" - Vogue 

"The Most Inspiring Beauty Brand Ever" - Cosmopolitan Magazine 

BACKORDERED WITH BRAND: ALL PRE-ORDERS TO SHIP IMMEDIATELY ONCE IN. THANK YOU!

An anti-aging asset that soothes, nurtures, and moisturizes skin thanks to olive-derived squalane oil and hyaluronic acid - which have been known to improve cellular function, skin texture (minimizes pores), tone (evens out complexion), and color (revives natural glow). The result? Younger, healthier, and more radiant skin. 

  • Ingredients Offer Antioxidant and Detoxifier Properties 
  • Fast Absorption Rate: A Serious Advantage for Oil-Prone Skin Types
  • Vegan
  • Paraben Free
  • Phthalate Free
  • Sulfate Free
  • No Artificial Fragrances 
  • Never Tested on Animals
  • 1oz. 

Our Beauty Notes: A beautifully effective moisturizer that tackles dry spots, tightens aging skin, and works to successfully even out skin tone. This active ingredient of squalane is a natural antioxidant, preventing UV damage, age spots, promoting cell growth and is an antibacterial. 

Indie Lee tugged at our heart strings initially with her story of overcoming a brain tumor to discover the link between conventional beauty and its potential health harm. After learning about her story, she then struck us with a genius product line that conquers disbelieve in clean beauty. Since regaining her health, she has taken the clean beauty world by storm creating the chic, effective and modern (right up our alley!): Indie Lee. 

Ingredients 

Aqua, Simmondsia Chinensis, Persea Gratissima, Aloe Barbadensis, Emulsifying Wax, Vegetable Glycerin, Elaeis Guineensis, Palm Stearic Acid, Squalane (olive derived), Hyaluronic Acid, Tocopheryl Acetate, Rosa Rubiginosa Seed Oil, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Dl-Panthenol, Allantoin, Xanthan Gum, Triticum Vulgare, Daucus Carota Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis Leaf Extract, Phenoxyethanol

Use

Apply a small amount to face and neck. Massage gently in upward motions. Use daily after cleansing. For external use only.

entry.title: Swiss Apple Facial Serum

Vendor: Indie Lee
Type: Skincare
Price: 130.00

Description
Brand Seen In: Cosmopolitan, Vogue, Refinery29, Zoe Report, Today Show, Lucky, Marie Claire, Allure, Style, Glamour, ELLE, Bazaar & More

"The Most Inspiring Beauty Brand Ever" - Cosmopolitan Magazine 

A revolutionary anti-aging serum designed to even the skin tone, reduce wrinkles, and preserve a youthful appearance. Formulated with the stem cells of a rare Swiss apple, this combination of rich proteins, phytonutrients, and metabolites boosts cell production and protects your skin from environmental stress.

Our Beauty Notes: An aggressive merriment of skin preserving ingredients created to address signs of dullness, environmental stressers fine lines and wrinkles. This facial serum with it's gel-like consistency tightens skin as it dries offering a unique list of powerful ingredients that help to turnover skin into a brighter, younger and healthier looking version. Especially important during the PM regimen.

Indie Lee tugged at our heart strings initially with her story of overcoming a brain tumor to discover the link between conventional beauty and its potential health harm. After learning about her story, she then struck us with a genius product line that conquers disbelieve in clean beauty. Since regaining her health, she has taken the clean beauty world by storm creating the chic, effective and modern (right up our alley!): Indie Lee. 

Ingredients 

Seaweed Extract, Purified Water, Hyaluronic Acid, Malus Domestica Fruit Cell Culture, Xanthan Gum, Lecithin, Phenoxyethanol*, Ethylhexylglycerin* *Derived from natural sources.

Use

Apply 2 or 3 drops of serum to face and throat after cleansing day and night. Use on its own or apply underneath moisturizer; allow 5 minutes absorption time before applying makeup and 15 minutes absorption time before applying sunscreen. For external use only.

entry.title: Rosehip Cleanser
entry.summary:

Description
Brand Seen In: Cosmopolitan, Vogue, Refinery29, Zoe Report, Today Show, Lucky, Marie Claire, Allure, Style, Glamour, ELLE, Bazaar & More 

"Certified Chic" - Vogue 

"The Most Inspiring Beauty Brand Ever" - Cosmopolitan Magazine 

Harnessing the power of vitamin-rich rosehip oil, this gentle yet indulgent cleanser and eye makeup remover soothes skin to help slow the signs of aging, preserve moisture, and treat redness and rosacea.

  • Gentle enough for sensitive skin
  • High in antioxidants and Vitamins A, E, and K
  • Helps improve the appearance of wrinkles and moisturizes skin
  • Offers a fresh and light rose scent 
  • Gentle enough to clean makeup brushes (we recommend doing this weekly!)
  • Can be used with a cleansing brush 
  • No synthetics, toxins or chemicals. 

  4 oz.   

Our Beauty Notes: If you're looking for a very light, yet effective cleanser this is your girl. Beautifully simple and highly effective at cleansing the skin this is perfect for sensitive skin or those that prefer a light cleanser. The rose aroma smells beautiful, while we also use it to clean makeup brushes or use with a hand held cleansing sponge for added exfoliation.  

Indie Lee tugged at our heart strings initially with her story of overcoming a brain tumor to discover the link between conventional beauty and its potential health harm. After learning about her story, she then struck us with a genius product line that conquers disbelieve in clean beauty. This simple, multitasking cleanser is designed to naturally wash away impurities (including eye makeup!) to leave skin soft, refreshed, and luminous. A blend of natural ingredients - including lycopene and hydrolyzed wheat protein - make it ideal for cleansing, hydrating, tightening, firming, and complexion control. 

    Cheer up more than just your complexion: This antioxidant rich formula exudes a light strawberry aroma, which brightens the skin and the senses without overpowering.

    Multi-tasking product: When applied to face and left to sit for 5-10 minutes (before rinsing), this complexion clearer acts as an exfoliating mask. Also removes your makeup in the same step: It gently removes makeup without stripping the skin of necessary nutrients. It’s also a great formula for cleaning makeup brushes!  4 oz.   

    Our Beauty Notes: This favorite Indie Lee Cleanser is simple yet effective in skincare multitasking, its gel-like cleanser tackles stubborn eye makeup with one pump, while two pumps rid an entire face of makeup and dirt. With the ability to work as an exfoliator if left on to "sit" on the skin and smells like the things dreams are made off. Clear, bright and younger looking skin is in your future.

entry.title: Vitamin B Enzyme CLEANSING OIL + MAKEUP REMOVER (Original Award-Winning Version)
entry.summary:
Vendor: One Love Organics
Type: Skincare
Price: 42.00

Description

AWARD WINNING BRAND SEEN IN:

InStyle, Vogue, ELLE, Allure, Glamour & More

AWARDED BEST IN BEAUTY, GLAMOUR 2016

The Original Award-Winning Formula! 

The ultimate in multi-tasking luxury, Vitamin B Enzyme Cleansing Oil + Makeup Remover effortlessly lifts away impurities and makeup while restoring skin’s natural moisture barrier and pH balance. This non-stripping, clean-rinsing formula features papain, a fruit enzyme that helps to exfoliate and soften, and a natural Vitamin B complex to detoxify and tone. Designed with dry, dehydrated skin in mind yet concentrated enough for all skin types, The Cleansing Oil is ultra-effective when used alone or as the perfect first step in any double cleansing routine. 

Our Beauty Notes: If you're skipping one critical step - this is likely it. Properly removing your makeup is essential to clear, bright skin! Because of this, this powerful 2-n-1 Cleansing Oil + Makeup Remover is life-changing. Use with a Cleansing Sponge to deeply remove makeup and dirt and rinse well before applying serums, treatments and/or moisturizers. Plus, this smells like a warm vacation in a bottle! 

Directions

Gently press pump to dispense a small amount of serum. Apply to clean, damp face and neck day and night.

Ingredients 

organic helianthus annuus (sunflower) seed oil*, caprylic/capric triglyceride, di-ppg-2 myreth-10 adipate, polyglycerol-3 beeswax, lecithin* (and) cucurbita pepo (pumpkin) seed oil* (and) papain*, carica papaya (papaya) seed oil, tocopherol, fragrance/parfum

*Ingredients from Organic Farming

entry.title: Easy Does It Balancing Gel Cleanser
entry.summary:
Vendor: One Love Organics
Type: Skincare
Price: 29.00

Description

AWARD WINNING BRAND SEEN IN: 

InStyle, Vogue, ELLE, Allure, Glamour & More

It turns out a little cleansing goes a lot farther than you think. Often times, our best efforts at clear pores clear out our skin’s natural defenses, too. With a unique combination of organic Chilean soap bark, cold-pressed apple oil and vegetable glycerin, Easy Does It lathers into a soothing, non-drying foam that cleans, softens and helps to protect face, body and hair. That’s right. Turns out those 17 different soaps and shampoos aren’t necessary after all.

Our Beauty Notes: Effective, gentle, non-drying (and non-toxic) cleansers that create suds safely are hard to come by, which is one of many reasons we can’t seem to put this down. The glycerin is an organic compound that works to address everything from acne scars, blackheads and large pores to hydration and signs of aging.  When married with the Chilean soap bark and cold-pressed apple oil this works to balance your skins pH. Pairs perfectly with One Love Organics Cleansing Heart Sponge to clean deeper, tackle unique face crevices and to ensure makeup removal. OUR TIP: Can also be used as a family shampoo and body wash thanks to its gentle nature. 

Directions

Massage onto damp skin using gentle, circular motions. Rinse thoroughly.

Ingredients 

Aqua (Water), Glycerin, Sodium Coco-Glucoside Tartrate, Sodium Hydroxypropylsulfonate Laurylglucoside Crosspolymer, Sodium Cocoyl Hydrolyzed Amaranth Protein, Sodium Cocoamphoacetate, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Lauryl Glucoside, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Oil, Quillaja Saponaria Bark Extract, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Sodium Hydroxypropylsulfonate Decylglucoside Crosspolymer, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Sodium Lauryl Glucose Carboxylate, Lonicera Caprifolium (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Lonicera Japonica (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract

entry.title: Vitamin C BRIGHTENING FACIAL SERUM
entry.summary:
Vendor: One Love Organics
Type: Skincare
Price: 75.00

Description
AWARD WINNING BRAND SEEN IN:
InStyle, Vogue, ELLE, Allure, Glamour & More

 

Vitamin C Brightening Facial Serum takes a triple action approach to help visibly brighten skin dulled by stress and environmental elements. This plant powered formula uses two potent sources of Vitamin C, synergistic C boosters – organic green tea and Vitamin E – and a clinically proven botanical active to increase luminosity and nourish skin for a more radiant, even-toned complexion.

Our Beauty Notes: Not all Vitamin C serums are alike. This will help transform your skins texture, discoloration and tone as it’s designed as a treatment oppose to just a moisturizer. This was strategically created using the C Ester form of Vitamin C, oppose to inexpensive low-concrentrated alternatives, to give you superior results through the highest-quality ingredients. Depending on your skins needs you can use this as your treatment-and-moisturizer in one thanks to its thicker formula. We felt immediate results, saw hyper-pigmentation brighten within 4 weeks and after two skin cell cycle turnovers - people noticed the difference. Completely suitable for sensitive skin. We suggest “pressing” this into the skin first and then using gentle, upward motions spreading the remaining over the entire face and neck.  

*Quality Fact: Vitamin C Ester is fat soluble unlike the water soluble ascorbic acid form. Ascorbic acid is the form of Vitamin C found in most products and is very inexpensive to use and can be irritating. This serum uses quality C Ester form along with Rosehips, Acerola and Baobab Oil, all of which are very rich and potent sources of Vitamin C. Plus, the green tea and Vitamin E act synergistically with Vitamin C helping to increase efficiency. 

 

Directions

Gently press pump to dispense a small amount of serum. Apply to clean, damp face and neck day and night. 

Ingredients 

simmondsia chinesis (jojoba) seed oil*, butyrospermum parkii (shea) oil*, camellia sinensis (green tea) seed oil*, limnanthes alba (meadowfoam) seed oil, jojoba esters (and) tocopherol, capric/caprylic triglyceride (and) humulus lupulus (hops) strobile, adansonia digitata (baobab) oil*, helianthus annuus (sunflower) seed oil (and) malpighia glabra (acerola) fruit extract*, rosa canina (rosehip) oil*, hippophae rhamnoides (sea buckthorn) oil*, rose extract, ascorbyl palmitate *Ingredients from Organic Farming

entry.title: Love Springs Eternal Youth Preservation Serum
entry.summary:
Vendor: One Love Organics
Type: Skincare
Price: 75.00

Description

AWARD WINNING BRAND SEEN IN: 

InStyle, Vogue, ELLE, Allure, Glamour & More

This luxuriously lightweight oil boasts some of Mother Nature’s most effective (and clinically proven) gifts: Blue Seakale, a marine plant, to soothe and revitalize; and protein-rich sea algae, to deeply moisturize for improved skin tonicity and firmness. Green tea, watermelon and jasmine oils easily absorb into skin for a super effective nighttime boost of emollient moisture. At the heart of this restorative elixir, Barbary Fig Plant Stem Cells and D’Orientine S, a botanical active extracted from date seeds, display strong youth preservation properties and help to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. EcoCert Certified.

Our Beauty Notes: Our favorite part of this serum is the clinically proven D’Orientine S, which aggressively fights wrinkles and environmental aging. The merriment of ingredients work to plump, hydrate and deeply repair. We can’t stop using it under the eyes in conjunction with an eye cream as its suitable for the eye area. Ideal for new to experienced face oils users as it absorbs quickly without an additional “film.” We appreciate that it works for all skin types and pairs well with reactive, blemish-prone, inflamed and combination skin thanks to the blend of watermelon, jasmine and green tea that works to detox and rid of extra dirt. Many wear it day and night, although its designed for evening use. First place it only on your fingertips, press (very critical step) into the skin and then rub gently in upward circular motions. If you layer with another facial serum or moisturizer simply scale back to half a pump.   

Directions

Apply 3-5 drops to clean, damp skin every evening.

Ingredients

Ingredients: camellia sinensis (green tea) seed oil*, limnanthes alba (meadowfoam) seed oil, citrullus vulgaris (watermelon) seed oil, caprylic/capric triglyceride (and) phoenix dactylifera (date) seed extract, alaria (algae) esculenta extract, crambe maritima (blue seakale) leaf extract, opuntia ficus indica (barbary fig) cell extract, jasminum officinale (jasmine) extract, tocopherol. *Ingredients from Organic Farming

entry.title: Skin Savior Multi-Tasking Wonder Balm
entry.summary:
Vendor: One Love Organics
Type: Skincare
Price: 49.00

Description

AWARD WINNING BRAND SEEN IN:

InStyle, Vogue, ELLE, Allure, Glamour & More

Best in Beauty Award by Byrdie, 2015

Let simplicity reign in your life and on your skin. Why complicate your day juggling products when one wonder answers all calls? The ultimate multi-tasker, Skin Savior removes dirt and makeup without stripping the skin, moisturizes, illuminates and even turns mineral powder into a glowing foundation treatment. With an antioxidant-rich blend of organic coconut oil, mango butter, jojoba and chia, this citrus and vanilla treat is the perfect solution for just about any of your skin's needs. 

Our Beauty Notes: A true go-getter. Cleansing balms are all the rage for good reason, they double as a cleanser and a hydrator ridding your face of impurities taking with it traces of makeup and dirt without stripping your face. To dig deeper, this has the potential to act as a cleanser, a moisturizer, to a custom makeup treatment when paired with mineral foundation (amazing). We appreciate how a little goes a long way and we love how acne-prone, red and inflamed skin can use this just as easily as those with normal or sensitive skin. Follow the directions closely and you’ll quickly see why this is a beauty industry favorite. This is also our secret weapon for combatting air travel skin dehydration issues!  

Directions & Tips

TO CLEANSE 

Warm a small amount in your hands and gently massage onto dry skin. Remove with a warm, damp cloth.

TO MOISTURIZE 

Warm a 1/2 pea-sized amount in your hands and apply to damp skin. A little goes a loooong way.

FOR CUSTOM TREATMENT FOUNDATION

Sprinkle your favorite mineral powder into a small amount of Skin Savior. Blend together with your finger or make up brush. Add more minerals for heavier coverage. Mix colors for a custom color match. Apply to your skin for a smooth, dewy look.

Ingredients

cocos nucifera (virgin coconut) oil*, glycine soja (sweet soy) seed oil*, cera alba (beeswax)*, simmondsia chinesis (jojoba) seed oil*, jojoba esters, citrus aurantium dulcis (orange) peel wax, mangifera indica (mango) seed butter*, salvia hispanica (chia) seed extract (and) rosmarinus officinalis (rosemary) leaf extract*, avena sativa (oat kernel oil), limnanthes alba (meadowfoam) seed oil, tocopherol, vanilla planifolia fruit extract*

*Ingredients from Organic Farming

entry.title: Brand New Day Microderma Scrub & Masque
entry.summary:
Vendor: One Love Organics
Type: Skincare
Price: 39.00

 Description

AWARD WINNING BRAND SEEN IN: 

InStyle, Vogue, ELLE, Allure, Glamour & More

This superfine, water-activated exfoliator combines organic sweet pea flour, pineapple enzymes and mineral rich kaolin clay to remove impurities, clarify, and smooth skin for a luminous, baby-soft complexion. EcoCert Certified. 

Our Beauty Notes: Complete game-changer. Your skin will thank you for this incredibly effective and clarifying scrub. When used as a mask it never crumbles and never over-dries. Depending on your skins needs you can use this daily or bi-weekly as an exfoliator or mask no matter your skin type. If you have sensitive skin ease into use beginning once a week and always follow-up with a face serum and/or moisturizer. 

Directions

TO SCRUB:

Mix in the palm of your hand with a bit of warm water and blend into a creamy paste. Massage onto damp face using gentle, circular motions. Rinse with warm water.

TO MASQUE:

Mix with equal parts water for an exfoliating masque, greek yogurt for a clarifying masque, or raw honey for a hydrating masque. Apply to damp skin. Leave on for 10-15 minutes. Rinse with warm water. 

Ingredients 

zea mays (corn) starch*, pisum sativum (pea) flour*, sodium cocoyl glutamate, kaolin, ananas comosus (pineapple) fruit extract*, fragrance/parfum *Ingredients from Organic Farming

entry.title: Vitamin E Eye Balm
entry.summary:
Vendor: One Love Organics
Type: Skincare
Price: 49.00

Description

AWARD WINNING BRAND SEEN IN:

InStyle, Vogue, ELLE, Allure, Glamour & More

A powerful blend of Vitamin E, organic shea butter, pomegranate and protein-rich sea kelp, this luxurious, intensely rich eye balm helps to smooth, firm and provide continuous hydration day and night. Apply sparingly during the day for effective layering and liberally at night for a deeply moisturizing treatment.

Our Beauty Notes: This balm eye treatment is a rich evening eye cream that works to firm, brighten and deeply hydrate even the most sensitive skin. This concentrated balm goes a long way and it’s important to use lightly during the day, especially for makeup wearers, and apply more liberally in the evening before bed for the best results. Great around the lips before bed, as well! 

Directions

Using ring finger, press gently around the eye area beginning in the inner corner and lightly dabbing out to your hairline and back through over your brow bone.

Ingredients 

butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter*, jojoba esters (and) tocopherol, helianthus annuus (sunflower) seed oil*, punica granatum (pomegranate) sterols, adansonia digitata (baobab) oil*, aspalathus linearis (rooibos) extract*, centella asiatica (gotu kola) extract*, euphrasia officinalis (eyebright) extract*, caprylic/capric triglyceride (and) alaria esculenta (kelp) extract, lavandula angustifolia (lavender) essential oil*, foeniculum vulgare (fennel) essential oil* *Ingredients from Organic Farming

entry.title: The Cleansing Sponge ROSE CLAY HEART
entry.summary:
Vendor: One Love Organics
Type: Skincare
Price: 10.00

Description

AWARD WINNING BRAND SEEN IN:

InStyle, Vogue, ELLE, Allure, Glamour & More

The Cleansing Sponge is made with 100-percent pure konjac plant fiber, prized for its ability to detoxify pores and smooth skin while buffing away dirt and makeup. Soft yet exfoliating, The Cleansing Sponge is ideal for everyday use on even the most sensitive skin.

Rose Clay Heart: Perfect for rosacea, sensitive, mature and dry skin. 

Our Beauty Notes: How did these ever slip from our beauty radar? MUST-have is an understatement here. These cute and cleverly designed cleansing sponges help to amplify the cleansing process, while allowing you to reach every face nook and cranny. You’ll be surprised by how much makeup you weren’t removing before this helpful little tool. Pay close attention to the directions and tips section (squeeze all water out, never leave in the shower, hang to dry between use) and you’ll never look back. This is perfect for sensitive, mature, dry or rosacea skin. 

Directions & Tips 

Dampen sponge in warm water until it softens and expands to double its original size. Apply cleanser to sponge and gently massage skin in circular motions. Rinse thoroughly after each use and hang to dry. 

Before Each Use: Soak the dry The Cleansing Sponge with warm water until fully softened and expanded. Remove excess water by gently squeezing the sponge.

After Each Use: Rinse sponge with clean, warm water and hang to dry in a well-ventilated area. Do not twist or squeeze the sponge too hard or leave it in a damp/humid place. Extended moisture will cause the konjac fibers to disintegrate.

As needed: Disinfect the sponge by soaking it in hot (not boiling) water for about 3-5 minutes then hang to dry.

With daily use and proper care, The Cleansing Sponge will last up to 3 months. Happy cleansing!

entry.title: The Cleansing Sponge BAMBOO CHARCOAL HEART

Before Each Use: Soak the dry The Cleansing Sponge with warm water until fully softened and expanded. Remove excess water by gently squeezing the sponge.

After Each Use: Rinse sponge with clean, warm water and hang to dry in a well-ventilated area. Do not twist or squeeze the sponge too hard or leave it in a damp/humid place. Extended moisture will cause the konjac fibers to disintegrate.

As needed: Disinfect the sponge by soaking it in hot (not boiling) water for about 3-5 minutes then hang to dry.

With daily use and proper care, The Cleansing Sponge will last up to 3 months. Happy cleansing!

entry.title: Easy Does It Balancing Gel Cleanser (Trial & Travel Size)
entry.summary:
Vendor: One Love Organics
Type: Skincare
Price: 9.00

Description

AWARD WINNING BRAND SEEN IN: 

InStyle, Vogue, ELLE, Allure, Glamour & More

TRIAL & TRAVEL SIZE: It turns out a little cleansing goes a lot farther than you think. Often times, our best efforts at clear pores clear out our skin’s natural defenses, too. With a unique combination of organic Chilean soap bark, cold-pressed apple oil and vegetable glycerin, Easy Does It lathers into a soothing, non-drying foam that cleans, softens and helps to protect face, body and hair. That’s right. Turns out those 17 different soaps and shampoos aren’t necessary after all.

SIZE: 2.25 oz.

Our Beauty Notes: Effective, gentle, non-drying (and non-toxic) cleansers that foam, or suds-up, are hard to come by, which is one of many reasons we can’t seem to put this down. The glycerin is an organic compound that works to address everything from acne scars, blackheads and large pores to hydration and signs of aging.  When married with the Chilean soap bark and cold-pressed apple oil this works to balance your skins pH. Pairs perfectly with One Love Organics Cleansing Heart Sponge to clean deeper, tackle unique face crevices and to ensure makeup removal. OUR TIP: Can also be used as a family shampoo and body wash thanks to its gentle nature. 

Directions

Massage onto damp skin using gentle, circular motions. Rinse thoroughly.

Ingredients 

Aqua (Water), Glycerin, Sodium Coco-Glucoside Tartrate, Sodium Hydroxypropylsulfonate Laurylglucoside Crosspolymer, Sodium Cocoyl Hydrolyzed Amaranth Protein, Sodium Cocoamphoacetate, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Lauryl Glucoside, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Oil, Quillaja Saponaria Bark Extract, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Sodium Hydroxypropylsulfonate Decylglucoside Crosspolymer, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Sodium Lauryl Glucose Carboxylate, Lonicera Caprifolium (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Lonicera Japonica (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract
